review.reviewBody: the sandwich had too much fat on the meat but the pasta was good. Very small garlic bread for extra price
Fries are my absolute favourite and the burgers never disappoint.
cold and bland. very disappointed. bread was soggy and auj sauce was very salty. maybe dine in would be preferred for these menu items
they always seem to forget add one but thr food is delicious
The food from here is always amazing. The steak bites were perfectly cooked and the Yorkers were fluffy and delicious.
